description: An informational message sent by js2at infrastructure to an AT, that does not have a corresponding request

$command.description: The type of schema change, observerAdded or observerRemoved

pattern.description: A url that defines requests and responses

appId.description: An automatically populated id corresponding to the host browser or other application serving the content

docId.description: An automatically populated id corresponding to the document

uid.description: An id corresponding to an in-page object that this message relates to
